item.title: Democracies in the time of Covid
item.description: Over the past weeks I have had conversation with families and friends about coronavirus and about how different governments are responding to the challenge. One point that was mentioned often in the discussion was that its the countries with stronger government that have stayed off the crisis whereas democratic countries are the ones who cannot fight off the pandemic. Just because democracies make it slow. I live in a democracy and believe in democracies ðŸ’• so I did find this idea a bit off-putting.
